General.Name: Goldea
General.Description: Goldea is a gold mining operation in which proceeds are destributed to all GEA holders. GEA is an ERC20 token.

ICO.Description:
Goldea is a gold mining operation in which proceeds are destributed to all GEA holders. GEA is an ERC20 token.

Team:

  • Draško Jocić: Founder and CEO 
  • Dr.Uroš Herlec: Main Geologist 
  • Ing. Vital Dittrich: Mine Engineer
  • Nadiorou Dabo: Country Manager

The Goldea ICO will start on the 1st of December 2017 and will end on the 31st of March 2018. The ICO token allocation is set at 77% of the total supply. The tokens will be available for a $12 starting price and can be bought with BTC and ETH. The funding soft cap is set at 20000 ETH and the hard cap is set at 60000 ETH.

Token Reserve Split (23%):

  • 20% Team,
  • 2% Bounty,
  • 1% Pre-ICO

The Goldea ICO features an escrow agent and also a bonus and bounty campaigns.

Bonus Structure:

  • 1st week of each round - 15%,
  • 2nd of each round - 10%,
  • 3rd of each round - 5%.
